T02D2168:312b-1: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ti n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni s'a dha nam /
T02D2168:312b-3: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs //
T02D2168:312b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2168:312b-5: dang por re zhig rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dbus su yi ge h'um bsams te /
T02D2168:312b-6: de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs snang bya ste /
T02D2168:312b-7: mchod pa bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum zhes bya
T02D2168:312b-8: ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas
T02D2168:312b-9: // byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom mo //
T02D2168:312b-10: de nas rang gi sems rig par bya ste /
T02D2168:312b-11: chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa ste /
T02D2168:312b-12: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas bdag med pa sems kyi sprul pa tsam ste /
T02D2168:312b-13: 'di ltar bsams nas de nyid kyi sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D2168:312b-14: de nas rnam pa lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas /
T02D2168:312b-15: bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2168:312b-16: sku mdog nag po yi ge h'um las byung ba /
T02D2168:312b-17: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D2168:312b-18: spyan gsum pa sprul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2168:312b-19: gos sngon bsnams pa mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2168:312b-21: gsang sngags las ji skad brjod pa'i tshul 'dzin par bsgoms nas /
T02D2168:312b-22: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2168:312b-26: rjes su mnyes par byas la /
T02D2168:312b-27: lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2168:312b-28: phung po dang skye mched lha'i nga rgyal byas te dbang bskur nas /
T02D2168:312b-29: yang mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02D2168:312b-30: bdud rtsi myang ba la thug pa byas nas /
T02D2168:312b-31: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra ya /
T02D2168:312b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2168:312b-33: bzlas pas skyon cung zad bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2168:312b-34: de nas ldang bar 'dod na gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te bsngos la /
T02D2168:312b-35: de nas ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol te /
T02D2168:312b-36: bdag nyid dpal phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas spyod lam bya'o //
T02D2168:312b-37: de la rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pa
T02D2168:312b-38: bskyed pa ni chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma
T02D2168:313a-2: sems tsam gyi rnam par dmigs te /
T02D2168:313a-3: sems kyi bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor aa yig gi rnam pa can bsgoms la /
T02D2168:313a-4: aom pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes brjod pa nas /
T02D2168:313a-5: yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas /
T02D2168:313a-6: aom bo dhi tsitta autb'a d'a y'a mi zhes brjod pas /
T02D2168:313a-7: ka yig ge rnam pa can gyi zla ba bsgom mo //
T02D2168:313a-8: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo
T02D2168:313a-9: rje 'bar ba bum pa h'um gis mtshan pa bsgoms
T02D2168:313a-10: te / aom tishtha badzra zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2168:313a-11: gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag nyid rdo rjer gyur nas /
T02D2168:313a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pa'i 'od zer bsdus pa'i sbyor ba byas pas /
T02D2168:313a-15: ji skad du brjod pa'i dpal phyag na rdo rjer gyur par byas la /
T02D2168:313a-16: ya th'a badzra dha ra sh'a aa ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2168:313a-17: sngon du gnas bskyed par 'dod pa rnams kyis stong
T02D2168:313a-18: pa nyid las bka'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa rab
T02D2168:313a-20: dbus su khro bo gnod mdzes rgyal po //
T02D2168:313a-21: rtsibs rnams la khro bo bcu rim bzhin bsams te /
T02D2168:313a-22: h'um bzhi'i sngags brjod pas khro bo bcu'i 'od zer
T02D2168:313a-23: gyis gdug pa can thams cad bkug ste sku gsung
T02D2168:313a-24: thugs kyi phur pa btab pas khro bo bcu'i 'od
T02D2168:313a-25: zer gyis thams cad btul zhing sbyangs te nam mkha'i
T02D2168:313a-26: ngo bo nyid du gyur par bya'o //
T02D2168:313a-27: de nas yang nam mkha' la ram nyi ma la
T02D2168:313a-28: gnas pa'i h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i 'od zer
T02D2168:313a-29: gyis rdo rje rab dang sa gzhi dang dra bas
T02D2168:313a-30: bskor ba'i dkyil du khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par
T02D2168:313a-31: bya'o // de yang kha cig ni rlung gi dkyil
T02D2168:313a-32: 'khor ni ri rab la thug gi bar du rim
T02D2168:313a-33: pa bzhin bskyed nas de yongs su gyur pa las
T02D2168:313a-34: khang pa brtsegs pa bya zhes 'dod do //
T02D2168:313a-35: kha cig ni ri rab kyi steng na khang pa brtsegs pa zhes 'dod do //
T02D2168:313a-36: kha cig ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dkyil du bskyed par 'dod do //
T02D2168:313a-37: 'dir ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2168:313a-39: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2168:313a-40: tva ra na bzhis mdzes par byas //
T02D2168:313a-41: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa la sogs pas
T02D2168:313a-42: brgyan pa'i dbus su sna tshogs padma la nyi ma'i
T02D2168:313b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rnam @313b pa lngas mngon
T02D2168:313b-1: par byang chub pa'i rim pas sku bskyed par bya'o
T02D2168:313b-2: // ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba'i sngags ni
T02D2168:313b-3: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bya bas dgug pa la sogs pa
T02D2168:313b-4: mnyes pa la thug par bya'o //
T02D2168:313b-5: de la byin gyis brlab pa khams dang skye mched
T02D2168:313b-6: dag par bya ba ni rigs gsum dang rigs lnga'i
T02D2168:313b-7: rang bzhin du'o // dbang bskur ba ni me bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D2168:313b-8: mchod pa rnams ni phyi rol dag gis te phyi
T02D2168:313b-9: rol gyi mchod pa rnams ni aargha dang me tog
T02D2168:313b-10: la sogs rang gi ming gi dang po dang /
T02D2168:313b-11: tha ma'i phyag dang bcas pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2168:313b-12: bstod pa ni ming lnga'i shlo ka gcig gam /
T02D2168:313b-13: mang bcu pa'am ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa la sogs pas bstod pa bya'o //
T02D2168:313b-14: bzlas pa'i dus sku gsung thugs kyi lha dang ye
T02D2168:313b-15: shes sems dpa'i thugs kar gdan dang mtshan ma ji
T02D2168:313b-17: rang gi sa bon gyis mtshan par byas la /
T02D2168:313b-18: brtan nas gsang sngags kyi phreng ba rab tu 'od
T02D2168:313b-19: 'bar ba dang bcas pa spro ba dang bsdu bar
T02D2168:313b-20: bya'o // ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba'i
T02D2168:313b-21: dkyil 'khor h'um gis mtshan pa sngags kyi phreng ba
T02D2168:313b-22: bya'o // can no // slar gshegs su gsol ba
T02D2168:313b-23: ni sa bon snying po'am de nyid gsum gyi sngags
T02D2168:313b-24: mu: zhes bya ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2168:313b-25: lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub
